Max Clifford , the well-known public relations guru who reportedly received a lucrative settlement when his phones were tapped, said that Edmonson's firing and Andy Coulson 's resignation was like a volcano that is starting to erupt. `` There will be huge explosions all over Fleet Street if police get to the truth,'' he told the BBC.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

`` Hopefully, I'll be with the Eagles next year. We'll see what happens,'' said Michael Vick , who added that he expects`` everything to go according to plan.'' We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said.
